mapper.select: select CAST(wu.nickname AS CHAR(100) CHARACTER SET utf8) nickName, wu.head_img_url headImgUrl, sc.open_id, (select base_value from basedata where base_key = sc.vip) vip, sc.points, sc.redpacket_receive, sc.redpacket_amount from shop_customer as sc left join wx_user as wu on sc.open_id=wu.open_id where sc.open_id = #{openId}
